name: Salomon S/Pro 120 Ski Boots - Men's
description: High performance in a perfect fit. These hard driving boots cater to skiers who demand equal parts comfort and performance. A stiff fibreglass frame transfers your power efficiently for fast and furious turns. Adjustable flex gives you another tool to fine tune your performance any day of your season. Plus, the S/Pro Boots are the most comfortable ride that Salomon has ever crafted, so you'll ski better simply because nothing holds you back.Polyurethane shell with fibreglass framing transfers power efficiently to your ski.Coreframe 360 allows customization of the shell, cuff and liner.Shell can be thermo-moulded for personalized performance.Seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for a refined custom fit.4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit.45mm strap adds extra support at the top of the cuff.Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness.Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly.Medium width in a 100 mm last.Alpine soles and GripWalk-ready.
